name: The Splatters
description: "IGN: “Fun and addictive.” Destructoid: “A truly wonderful game 9/10.”   The Splatters are acrobatic masters with a unique death wish - to blow themselves up with style!  In this award winning action-puzzler, you will unlock and master a variety of stunts to clear out each stage in the most show-stopping way possible. It’s a messy, vibrant show of skill and splattery destruction.   Life’s short. DIE WITH STYLE."
